sentences.en: And first, I want a harpist, and then a string quartet.
sentences.cn: 一开始, 我要竖琴, 后来又换成了弦乐四重奏.

sentences.en: Dachaoshan come here especially for the Quartet, the famous Longhua temple.
sentences.cn: 四方朝山慕名纷至沓来, 龙华庙会声名远扬.

sentences.en: Even Jordan's party; the quartet from East Egg, were rent asunder by dissension.
sentences.cn: 连乔丹的那一伙,从东卵来的那四位, 也由于意见不和而四分五裂了.

sentences.en: Fantastic Symphony IV - March to the Scafford for Bassoon Quartet.
sentences.cn: 走向断头台 - 曲自幻想交响曲(为大管四重奏).

sentences.en: He rounded out his quartet with an autobiography.
sentences.cn: 他以自传作为他的四部曲的结尾.

sentences.en: Here was Old Stoeffle's everlasting Quartet.
sentences.cn: 这就是老史朵福永垂不朽的四重奏乐队.

sentences.en: In the Quartet reality is refracted through a variety of eyes ( Elizabeth Kastor )
sentences.cn: 在这个四重奏中,现实通过许多人的眼睛的折射而改变 ( 伊丽莎白卡斯托 )

sentences.en: Our quartet was out hustling and we knew we stood good to take in a lot of change before the night was over.
sentences.cn: 我们的四重奏是明显地卖座的,而且我们知道在天亮以前,我们有把握收入一大笔钱.

sentences.en: Quartet form, with large bright red, full of provocative and sexy fragrance.
sentences.cn: 外形四方, 配上鲜艳的大红色, 及充满挑逗的性感香氛.

sentences.en: String Quartet No.1 in G minor , Op . 10 : III. Andantino doucement expressly.
sentences.cn: 德彪西: 弦乐四重奏, 作品10——小行板乐章.

sentences.en: The concert began with a Mozart quartet.
sentences.cn: 音乐会以莫扎特的一首四重奏曲开始.

sentences.en: The Wedding of the Painted Doll for Bassoon Quartet.
sentences.cn: 彩色洋娃娃的婚礼(为大管四重奏).

sentences.en: This quartet represents a major new trend in modern music.
sentences.cn: 这首四重奏的曲子反映了现代音乐中一种主要的新趋向.

sentences.en: Three of the quartet that follow are at Emirates Stadium.
sentences.cn: 接下来的四场比赛三场将会在酋长球场.

phrases.tran_cn: 弦乐四重奏曲；弦乐四重奏乐团

trans.tran_cn: 四重唱（奏）曲，四重唱（奏）组，四件一套
trans.tran_en: four singers or musicians who sing or play together
